name: Banana VS Evil Raspberries
description: Banana was walking along when he drank the magical water which then an evil raspberry attacked him now they are multiplying! Help banana  defeat the evil raspberries. In banana vs evil raspberries avoid hitting the raspberries and drink the water. When a pink icon pops up with an ‘s’ on it that is a shield so when you hit the shield you get a circle around you and if you run into an enemy you won’t lose a life but you will lose the shield. When you see fire pop up that is the cleaner and when you hit it all the enemies disappear. To get more lives a heart will pop up and you have to run into it to get a new life. If you lose all your lives game over. To move hit the arrow keys.
